task_title: Write a Product Review on Amazon
submission_info: Submit a screenshot of your review on Amazon.
task_detail: Go to the Amazon product page at https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08N5WRWNW. Write a detailed review of your recent purchase. Mention the product features, pros and cons, and your overall experience. Ensure your review is at least 100 words long.

submission_info: Submit a screenshot of the completed survey on the app.
task_detail: Download the Fitness Pro app from https://www.fitnessproapp.com/download. Open the app and complete the user experience survey found under the 'Feedback' section. Share your thoughts on the app's functionality, design, and usability. Make sure to provide detailed feedback in each section of the survey.

submission_info: Submit a screenshot of the completed poll on the website.
task_detail: Visit the website www.pollwebsite.com and participate in the latest poll about current events. Provide your honest opinions and submit your answers. Make sure to fill out all the questions in the poll for it to be considered complete.

submission_info: Submit a screenshot of your final score and feedback form.
task_detail: Download the new mobile game 'Adventure Quest' from https://www.adventurequestgame.com/download. Play the game for at least 30 minutes and try to achieve the highest score possible. Fill out the feedback form provided in the app, detailing your experience and any suggestions for improvement.

submission_info: Submit a screenshot of your review on Yelp.
task_detail: Visit the restaurant 'Food Haven' and evaluate your dining experience. Post a detailed review on Yelp at https://www.yelp.com/biz/food-haven. Include the quality of food, service, and ambiance in your review. Ensure your review is at least 100 words long.

submission_info: Submit a screenshot of your published blog post.
task_detail: Write a detailed blog post on your personal blog about a recent travel experience. Include photos, travel tips, and recommendations. Publish the post and provide the link to the published article. Ensure your post is at least 500 words long.

submission_info: Submit a screenshot of your video uploaded on YouTube.
task_detail: Create a detailed video review of a tech gadget you recently purchased. Upload the video to your YouTube channel and include a link to the product in the description. Ensure your video is at least 5 minutes long and covers all aspects of the product.

task_title: Participate in a Market Research Survey
submission_info: Submit a screenshot of the completed survey on the website.
task_detail: Visit the market research website at https://www.marketresearchsurvey.com. Complete the survey about consumer preferences for a new product line. Ensure you answer all questions comprehensively. This will help shape future product offerings.

submission_info: Submit a screenshot of your review on Google.
task_detail: Visit a local service provider (e.g., a salon or repair shop) and evaluate their services. Post a detailed review on Google at https://www.google.com/maps. Include the quality of service, professionalism, and your overall satisfaction. Ensure your review is at least 100 words long.

submission_info: Submit a screenshot of the feedback session confirmation.
task_detail: Sign up for a feedback session at https://www.feedbacksession.com. Participate in a live video call where you'll share your opinions on a new product concept. Provide constructive feedback and suggestions for improvement. Ensure you attend the full session and actively engage in the discussion.

submission_info: Submit a screenshot of your app usage and feedback form.
task_detail: Download the new mobile app 'Health Tracker' from https://www.healthtrackerapp.com/download. Use the app for a week to track your daily health activities. Fill out the feedback form in the app, providing detailed comments on the app's usability and features.

submission_info: Submit a screenshot of your review on TripAdvisor.
task_detail: Visit the TripAdvisor page for a hotel you recently stayed at: https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review. Write a detailed review of your stay, including room quality, service, and amenities. Ensure your review is at least 150 words long.
